text:
The Life Of Every Party, Ranveer Turned DJ At His Reception & Dropped The Beat All Night Long!
The Life Of Every Party, Ranveer Turned DJ At His Reception & Dropped The Beat All Night Long!
Enthusiastic, crazy, energetic, handsome, versatile and a superstar – these words truly define Ranveer Singh. The man of many women’s dreams, Ranveer Singh is married to the love of his life now and since then he is high on happiness.
The newly-wed couple Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone threw a wedding reception bash for their families and friends in Mumbai yesterday. As soon as the couple made an appearance dressed like royalty, a lot of hearts were left swooning. The couple, who played Bajirao Mastani on the big screen, looked as regal as they looked in the movie yesterday.
It was crazy night. No, literally! Ranveer Singh, the energetic man he is, is the life of every party undoubtedly. Now that he is celebrating his own wedding full of love, he was having a gala time.
So much so, that he took over the DJ console, and danced like there was no tomorrow.
DJ Ranveer🤙🏻
🎥| Ranveer Singh at his wedding Reception in Mumbai 💗 #DeepVeerReception pic.twitter.com/8F93xV15xw — RanveerSingh TBT💗 (@RanveerSinghtbt) November 28, 2018

DJ Ranveer 🎧🎶
#DeepVeerReception #MrAndMrsDeepVeer pic.twitter.com/7RVccgkZ2b — Ranveerians Worldwide (@RanveeriansFC) November 29, 2018
Meanwhile, the papz have starting referring to Deepika as Bhabhi Ji, and the couple yesterday couldn’t stop laughing at that. They gushed and blushed over their newly-found nicknames. Take a look!
Well, if you think that the party is over. There’s another wedding reception that is scheduled to take place on Dec 1. Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone have reportedly invited all their friends from the B-Town. It’s going to be a starry affair!
title: The Life Of Every Party, Ranveer Turned DJ At His Reception & Dropped The Beat All Night Long!
description: Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone hosted their second wedding reception in Mumbai yesterday, and they dressed up like royalty. The much-in-love couple was high on happiness. Ranveer Singh took over the DJ console and danced his heart out at his Mumbai wedding reception.
